name: PopGate
overview:
PopGate helps businesses to build their presence both online and offline.

PoP refers to Point of Presence. In today’s business, creating, maintaining and extending that point of presence is vital. It is about building your brand, raising awareness about the things that you do in your business, reaching out to your intended audience and tell them what you can do for them.

Creating a website is only just the beginning, reaching out to your audience to drive them there is the tough part. A website is more than a portfolio showcase, think of it as a interaction channel between you and your clients. It is where your clients’ experience begins.

PopGate provides digital marketing solutions to reach out and engage your audience effectively. For offline marketing solutions, PopGate designs and prints marketing collateral, which will help to drive the crowd back into your website to continuously generate traffic.
